description: 6-Formylindolo(3,2-b)carbazole (FICZ) is a ligand that activates the Aryl hydrocarbon receptor (AhR).
FICZ induced AhR activation inhibits the DSS-induced decrease in TJ protein expression.
AhR activation prevents TNF-α-induced decrease in TER and morphological disruption of TJs.
AhR activation prevents IFN-γ-induced decrease in TER and morphological disruption of TJs.
AhR activation inhibits TNF-α/IFN-γ-induced increase in MLCK expression.
AhR activation inhibits TNF-α/IFN-γ-induced increase in MLC phosphorylation.
AhR activation suppresses the NF-κB p65 signaling pathway.
